page.title: Explore the Marketing Machine
page.subtitle: From Research to Results - Discover how the 9 layers of the autonomous marketing machine work seamlessly together, exactly as visualized in the AI Core Sphere. Each component builds on the previous for maximum efficiency.

research_planning.title: Research & Planning
research_planning.subtitle: The Brain of the Machine
research_planning.description: In-depth online research with Perplexity AI for trends, forecasting, and hashtag strategy. Perfect for scaling teams who need strategic insights without hiring researchers.

pain_agitation.problem: **You have no time for strategic research.** Every day, hours are lost manually searching for trends, comparing hashtags, and analyzing competitor content. By the time you find something useful, the trend has already passed.
pain_agitation.solution: The Research Hub runs 24/7 with 4 parallel AI agents using Perplexity for real-time trend forecasting. Automatic hashtag discovery, competitor tracking, and weekly theme planning integrated with your own brands and products.
pain_agitation.result: **3.2K trends tracked, 95% prediction accuracy, and 147 hours saved per month.** You get a ready-made content strategy every week that's current and relevant, without having to search for it yourself.

modal.overview: The intelligent brain of the marketing machine. Uses Perplexity AI for in-depth research into current trends, trend forecasting, and hashtag strategies. Creates weekly content themes based on real-time data, your own brands, partners, services, and webshop products.
capabilities: Hashtag strategy and trending topics analysis
Integration of own brands, partners and products
Content calendar fully prepared and ready for workflow

process_steps.title: Perplexity Research
process_steps.description: In-depth AI research into trends, hashtags, competitor activity and industry insights

process_steps.title: Theme Selection
process_steps.description: Select weekly overarching theme aligned with brand identity and trends

process_steps.title: Content Mapping
process_steps.description: Link own products, services and partners to weekly theme per platform

process_steps.title: Calendar Creation
process_steps.description: Complete content calendar ready for Manager Workflow to execute

manager_workflow.title: Manager Workflow
manager_workflow.subtitle: The Heart of the Machine
manager_workflow.description: Central workflow manager that retrieves the agenda weekly, executes A/B testing, and forwards everything to the Content Pipeline. Built for lean teams managing multiple channels.

pain_agitation.problem: **You're drowning in workflows and manual coordination.** Every week the same chaos: assembling calendars, distributing content across platforms, manual A/B testing, and constantly switching between tools. Nothing is automated.
pain_agitation.solution: The Manager Workflow orchestrates everything centrally. Automatic calendar retrieval, intelligent A/B testing, Telegram integration for direct control, and seamless forwarding to the Content Pipeline. Everything through one system.
pain_agitation.result: **275% ROI improvement through A/B testing, 98% workflow automation, and 160 content items per month.** Your team no longer needs to coordinate - the system handles it.

modal.overview: The beating heart that orchestrates everything. Retrieves the content calendar weekly (or individually via Telegram) from Research & Planning, executes strategic A/B testing, and forwards optimal content to the Content Pipeline for creation.
capabilities: Advanced A/B testing per content type
Content prioritization based on performance data

process_steps.title: Calendar Retrieval
process_steps.description: Automatically weekly or manually via Telegram commands

process_steps.title: A/B Test Setup
process_steps.description: Determine test variants per content item for optimal results

process_steps.title: Workflow Distribution
process_steps.description: Distribute tasks to Content Pipeline with priority

process_steps.title: Performance Monitoring
process_steps.description: Real-time tracking and adjustment of active content creation

content_pipeline.title: Content Pipeline
content_pipeline.subtitle: The Production Factory
content_pipeline.description: Generates content for Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube, LinkedIn and blogs. Your team of 3 doing the work of 30 - without hiring extra people.

pain_agitation.problem: **You can't scale without burning your budget.** 1 content creator can make max 10 posts per week. For 7 platforms, various formats and multi-account? You'd need an entire team. Unaffordable.
pain_agitation.solution: The Content Pipeline produces content for Instagram (posts, carousels, reels, stories), Facebook, TikTok, YouTube, LinkedIn and blogs. With Telegram approval system for quality control and self-learning AI that gets better continuously.
pain_agitation.result: **4x content output (160 posts/month), 94% approval rate, and ‚Ç¨4,500/month saved on freelancers.** From 40 to 160 posts per month, without hiring extra people.

modal.overview: The content production factory that creates high-quality posts for all major platforms. Intelligent platform adaptation ensures optimal format and tone per channel. Self-learning AI improves continuously through Telegram approval feedback loop.
capabilities: Telegram approval system with feedback loop
Automatic visual content creation and editing

process_steps.title: Content Briefing
process_steps.description: Receive briefing from Manager Workflow with theme and target

process_steps.title: AI Generation
process_steps.description: Generate platform-optimized content with visuals and captions

process_steps.title: Telegram Review
process_steps.description: Present content in Telegram for approval or feedback

process_steps.title: Publish or Iterate
process_steps.description: Send approved content to Publisher or refine based on feedback

analytics_lab.title: Analytics Lab
analytics_lab.subtitle: The Intelligence Center
analytics_lab.description: Real-time analytics with AI-powered insights. Perfect for teams managing 3-10 channels who need data-driven decisions without hiring analysts.
analytics_lab.pain_point: No insight into what actually works

pain_agitation.problem: **You have no idea what actually works.** You post content, but you don't know which formats, topics, or timings deliver the best results. You're flying blind without data-driven decisions.
pain_agitation.solution: The Analytics Lab tracks everything in real-time. AI-powered analysis identifies patterns, optimal posting times, and winning content formats. Automatic feedback to all modules for continuous optimization.
pain_agitation.result: **327% performance ROI improvement, 2.8K insights generated, and 97% prediction accuracy.** You know exactly what works and the system automatically optimizes based on that data.

modal.overview: The intelligence center that measures, analyzes, and optimizes everything. Collects real-time performance data from all platforms, applies AI analysis to identify patterns and opportunities, and feeds insights back to all modules for continuous improvement.
capabilities: Real-time performance tracking across all platforms
Optimal posting time identification per platform
Automatic feedback loops to all modules
ROI tracking per content type and campaign

process_steps.title: Data Collection
process_steps.description: Gather performance metrics from all platforms in real-time

process_steps.title: AI Analysis
process_steps.description: Apply machine learning to identify patterns and opportunities

process_steps.title: Insight Generation
process_steps.description: Create actionable recommendations based on analysis

process_steps.title: System Optimization
process_steps.description: Feed insights back to modules for automatic improvement

telegram_control.title: Telegram Control Center
telegram_control.subtitle: Your Mobile Command Center
telegram_control.description: Full system control via Telegram. Approve content, give feedback, request ad-hoc posts from anywhere. Built for busy teams who need mobile flexibility.
telegram_control.pain_point: No control without being at the computer

pain_agitation.problem: **You have no control without being at your computer.** You're always on the go, but important decisions require you to be behind a laptop. By the time you're back, opportunities have passed.
pain_agitation.solution: Telegram Control Center gives you full system control from your phone. Approve content, give feedback, request ad-hoc posts, trigger workflows, and monitor everything in real-time. All through simple chat commands.
pain_agitation.result: **85% time saved on coordination, 100% mobile control, and 24/7 system accessibility.** You manage the entire system from anywhere, anytime, with just your phone.

modal.overview: Your mobile command center for complete system control. Approve content for publication, provide feedback for AI learning, request ad-hoc content creation, and monitor all active workflows. Simple chat interface with rich previews and quick actions.

process_steps.title: Content Notification
process_steps.description: Receive Telegram message with content preview

process_steps.title: Quick Review
process_steps.description: Approve, reject, or provide specific feedback via buttons

process_steps.title: AI Learning
process_steps.description: System learns from your feedback patterns

process_steps.title: Automatic Improvement
process_steps.description: Future content better aligned with your preferences

publishing_layer.title: Publishing Layer
publishing_layer.subtitle: Automatic Distribution
publishing_layer.description: Automatically schedules content at ideal times per platform. Small teams publishing like enterprise - 24/7 consistency without manual work.

pain_agitation.problem: **Your posting is inconsistent and poorly timed.** Sometimes you post 3x per day, then 0. Wrong times, missed opportunities, and manual scheduling costs hours. Your algorithm ranking suffers.
pain_agitation.solution: The Publishing Layer analyzes optimal times per platform for your audience. Automatic smart scheduling with time-zone optimization, queue management, and 99.8% on-time posting. Zero manual work.
pain_agitation.result: **360 hours saved per month, 99.8% on-time delivery, and ‚Ç¨1,800/month less management overhead.** Perfect consistency across 7 platforms, 24/7, without having to look at it.

modal.overview: The distribution engine that automatically schedules all content at ideal times. Analyzes per platform when your audience is most active and automatically schedules for maximum reach and engagement.

process_steps.title: Optimal Time Analysis
process_steps.description: AI determines best posting times per platform and audience

process_steps.title: Schedule Planning
process_steps.description: Content is scheduled with smart spacing and frequency caps

process_steps.title: Automated Publishing
process_steps.description: Automatic posting at scheduled times via platform APIs

process_steps.title: Confirmation & Tracking
process_steps.description: Real-time confirmation and forwarding to Analytics

ad_builder.title: Ad Builder
ad_builder.subtitle: Ad Creation Engine
ad_builder.description: Upload a product photo and automatically generate platform-specific ads. Teams spending ‚Ç¨10K+/month on ads can pre-test before budget allocation.

pain_agitation.problem: **Your ad budget evaporates without results.** ‚Ç¨1,000 in an ad that flops, no idea why. Trial and error is too expensive. Which creative works? Which copy converts? Pure guesswork with your marketing budget.
pain_agitation.solution: The Ad Builder tests your ads organically before you allocate budget. Upload one product photo, get 5 platform variants, test them free on sub-accounts, and only invest in proven winners with predictable ROI.
pain_agitation.result: **+320% ROI through pre-testing, ‚Ç¨2,400/month saved on wasted budget, and 87% accuracy in predicting which ad performs best.** Zero guesswork - only data-driven ad spending.

modal.overview: The ad creation engine that transforms product photos into platform-optimized ads. Automatically generates A/B test variants, tests them organically for budget allocation, and predicts performance with 87% accuracy. Prevent wasted ad spend by only investing in winners.
capabilities: Product photo ‚Üí AI ad generation (automatic transformation)
Platform-specific formatting (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn, Pinterest)
A/B testing variant generator (3-5 variants per upload)
Pre-testing on organic test accounts (no budget waste)
ROI predictor based on historical data)
Auto-scaling for different ad sizes (Story, Feed, Reel formats)
Competitor ad analysis (what works in your niche)
Performance tracking per variant (real-time ROI monitoring)

process_steps.title: Budget Allocation
process_steps.description: Winning ad with highest predicted ROI gets paid budget

command_center.title: Command Center
command_center.subtitle: Client Dashboard & Control
command_center.description: Central dashboard for launching campaigns, creating ads, and complete data insights. One person controlling what normally requires a team of 10.

pain_agitation.problem: **You have no central overview.** Data scattered across 7 platforms, content calendar in spreadsheets, research in notes, campaigns in yet another system. You waste hours switching between tools.
pain_agitation.solution: The Command Center bundles everything in one dashboard. Launch campaigns with 1 click, create ads from a product photo, see real-time data per platform, view your content calendar, and access weekly research - all in one place.
pain_agitation.result: **100% transparency, ‚Ç¨1,600/month saved on tool subscriptions, and 2.3x more data-driven decisions per day.** Everything you need, one dashboard, zero chaos.

modal.overview: The central command center where the client has complete control and transparency. Launch campaigns, create ads from a product photo, view all data insightfully per platform (engagement, growth, etc.), see the content calendar and view weekly research.
capabilities: Real-time dashboard per platform (engagement, reach, growth)

process_steps.title: Dashboard Login
process_steps.description: Access to personal Command Center with all accounts

process_steps.title: Data Visualization
process_steps.description: Real-time insight into all KPIs per platform and account

process_steps.title: Take Action
process_steps.description: Launch campaigns, create ads, adjust strategy based on data

process_steps.title: Monitor & Optimize
process_steps.description: Continuous monitoring and data-driven decision making

ai_advisory.title: AI Advisor Partnership
ai_advisory.subtitle: Your Strategic Guide
ai_advisory.description: No technical knowledge? No problem. Personal guidance at every step - perfect for lean teams (1-5 people) who need expert support.

pain_agitation.problem: **You want to automate, but have no technical knowledge.** Marketing automation sounds great, but you have no idea where to start. Setup, integrations, optimization - it feels overwhelming without an expert in the background.
pain_agitation.solution: As your AI expert, I am your personal strategic partner. I help with onboarding, configuration, strategy adjustments, and continuous optimization. Think of it as a marketing automation consultant available 24/7 - without the consultant fee.
pain_agitation.result: **Zero technical knowledge required, 90% faster onboarded, and continuous strategic guidance.** You get all benefits of automation without the learning curve. I solve problems before you notice them.

modal.overview: Your personal AI strategic partner who helps you with every phase: from initial setup and platform integrations, to content strategy optimization and performance analysis. No technical knowledge required - I guide you at every step.
capabilities: Best practices for your specific industry
Custom automation workflows for your needs
Continuous learning of your brand & audience

process_steps.title: Onboarding & Discovery
process_steps.description: I learn your business, goals, tone-of-voice, and target audience

process_steps.title: Strategic Planning
process_steps.description: Together we develop a custom automation strategy for your situation

process_steps.title: Implementation Support
process_steps.description: I guide every integration, platform setup, and initial configuration

process_steps.title: Continuous Optimization
process_steps.description: Ongoing monitoring, recommendations, and strategy adjustments for maximum ROI
